TAGLINE: Authentic Italian cuisine in the heart of downtown
DESCRIPTION: Family-owned restaurant serving traditional Italian dishes made with the finest imported ingredients
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Our family-owned restaurant has been serving the community with pride for years. We believe in using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to create memorable dining experiences for our guests.
MENU_DESCRIPTION_1: Traditional Roman pasta with eggs, pancetta, and Parmigiano-Reggiano
MENU_DESCRIPTION_2: Slow-braised veal shank with saffron risotto and gremolata
MENU_DESCRIPTION_3: Wood-fired pizza with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil
MENU_DESCRIPTION_4: Selection of cured meats, cheeses, olives, and roasted vegetables
MENU_DESCRIPTION_5: Breaded chicken breast with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella
MENU_DESCRIPTION_6: House-made fettuccine in rich cream sauce with Parmigiano-Reggiano
MENU_DESCRIPTION_7: Arborio rice with shrimp, scallops, and mussels in white wine broth
MENU_DESCRIPTION_8: Tender veal medallions in lemon butter sauce with capers
MENU_DESCRIPTION_9: Seven-layer lasagna with meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella
MENU_DESCRIPTION_10: Thin crust with prosciutto di Parma, fresh arugula, and shaved Parmesan
MENU_DESCRIPTION_11: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone
MENU_DESCRIPTION_12: Three varieties: classic tomato, mushroom truffle, and ricotta honey
APPETIZER_1_DESCRIPTION: Selection of cured meats, cheeses, olives, and roasted vegetables
APPETIZER_2_DESCRIPTION: Three varieties: classic tomato, mushroom truffle, and ricotta honey
APPETIZER_3_DESCRIPTION: Crispy fried squid rings with spicy marinara and lemon aioli
APPETIZER_4_DESCRIPTION: Creamy burrata with heirloom tomatoes, basil, and aged balsamic
SOUP_1_DESCRIPTION: Traditional Italian vegetable soup with cannellini beans and pasta
SOUP_2_DESCRIPTION: Chicken broth with mini meatballs, spinach, and ditalini pasta
SALAD_1_DESCRIPTION: Crisp romaine with house-made Caesar dressing and garlic croutons
SALAD_2_DESCRIPTION: Baby arugula with pears, walnuts, and gorgonzola in lemon vinaigrette
MAIN_1_DESCRIPTION: Slow-braised veal shank with saffron risotto and gremolata
MAIN_2_DESCRIPTION: Breaded chicken breast with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella
MAIN_3_DESCRIPTION: Tender veal medallions in lemon butter sauce with capers
MAIN_4_DESCRIPTION: Arborio rice with shrimp, scallops, and mussels in white wine broth
MAIN_5_DESCRIPTION: Traditional Roman pasta with eggs, pancetta, and Parmigiano-Reggiano
MAIN_6_DESCRIPTION: House-made fettuccine in rich cream sauce with Parmigiano-Reggiano
DESSERT_1_DESCRIPTION: Classic Italian dessert with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone
DESSERT_2_DESCRIPTION: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips
DESSERT_3_DESCRIPTION: Vanilla custard with fresh berry compote and biscotti
DESSERT_4_DESCRIPTION: Three scoops of house-made gelato: pistachio, stracciatella, and limoncello
WINE_1_DESCRIPTION: Tuscany, medium-bodied with cherry notes and earthy finish
WINE_2_DESCRIPTION: Veneto, crisp and light with citrus and mineral notes
WINE_3_DESCRIPTION: Piedmont, full-bodied with complex tannins and long finish
COCKTAIL_1_DESCRIPTION: Gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with orange peel
COCKTAIL_2_DESCRIPTION: Aperol, prosecco, and soda water with orange slice
